title: Church Complaints, Steven A. Smith, Kanye West Visits Joel Osteen, Rodney Reed, Kim Kardashian West and more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, Steven A. Smith, Kanye West Visits Joel Osteen, Rodney Reed, Kim Kardashian West and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's Monday and Deacon Def Jam and Rev. Motown are here with church complaints, Stephen A. Smith calls in to discuss Colin Kaepernick's his future with the NFL. Plus, the crew weighs in on Kanye West's visit at Joel Osteen's church, Rodney Reed's scheduled execution by the state of Texas has been put on hold, how Kim Kardashian West is lending her voice to incite change in the prison reform bill and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
